artists.strBiographyEN: Chinese name 張信哲 (Traditional) Chinese name 张信哲 (Simplified) Pinyin zhang1 xin4 zhe2 (Mandarin) Ancestry Pinghe, Fujian Origin Taiwan Born March 26, 1967 (1967-03-26) Yunlin, Republic of China (Taiwan) Other name(s) Chang Shin Che Occupation Singer Genre(s) Mandopop Label(s) Elite Music Co, EMI, Sony Music Years active 1989-present Official site jeff.youyou.com   Jeff Chang (born Jeffrey Chang Shin-Che on 26 March 1967) is a Taiwanese male singer, who performs sentimental Mandarin pop ballads.  Chang was born in Yunlin, Taiwan. He started off his showbiz career by winning a singing competition while in college. Since 1989 he has released a string of highly successful albums and is known as the "Prince of Love Ballads" in the Chinese pop world. His name is well known across Taiwan, Hong Kong, Southeast Asia and mainland China.  Besides singing, Chang's interests include arts, antiques, travel and water sports.
